description: React component for managing accommodations, including listing, creating, updating, and deleting accommodations. It interacts with backend services and uses context for auth information.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fetches the list of accommodations and updates state.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Handles the creation of a new accommodation based on form input.

methods.name: onUpdate
methods.description: Updates an existing accommodation, e.g., increasing capacity.

methods.name: onDelete
methods.description: Deletes an accommodation after user confirmation.
